name: Meisho Doto (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Meisho Doto (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.6~0.8

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • meisho doto \(umamusume\)

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • white shirt, collared shirt, white gloves, shoulder bag, strap between breasts, blue skirt, long sleeves, white thighhighs, high heels, handbag, white footwear, center frills, sleeves past wrists

      • (optional) : @_@, cat on head

    • Casual clothes :

      • white sweater, ribbed sweater, turtleneck sweater, long sleeves, floral skirt, long skirt, yellow skirt, red sneakers

      • (her skirt is hard to generate)

    • Halloween costume :

      • hair ornament, hair flower, official alternate costume, pantyhose, strapless dress, white gloves, fishnets, wedding dress, bare shoulders, pink dress, choker, holding bouquet, shoes, jewelry

    • Christmas costume :

      • red dress, fur-trimmed dress, bare shoulders, off shoulder, christmas, fur-trimmed sleeves, off-shoulder dress, long sleeves, santa costume, cleavage, coat, bell, red bowtie

Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

    • about 20 steps, CFG scale 3.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • If using highres

      • Latent series

      • Denoising strength 0.50~0.65

LoRA training info

  • trained on sd-scripts by kohya_ss. Thank you a lot!

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 130 images of meisho doto

    • 4x low quality 42 images

    • 8x medium quality 47 images

    • 16x high quality 41 images

    • => 1 epoch = 1200 images

  • replaced character feature tags with meisho doto \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, brown hair, purple eyes, etc.

  • using aspect ratio bucketing

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • using dadaptation

  • batch size = 4, 9 epochs trained

  • clip skip = 1

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are generated by AOM3A1
